name: neglect
description: Neglect SDK â€” real-time market + token intelligence for Solana.
author: Neglect

scripts.generate:sdk: dotenv -e .env -- curl -H "Authorization: Bearer $GITHUB_TOKEN" -H "Accept: application/vnd.github.raw+json" -L "https://api.github.com/repos/NeglectApp/api-gateway/contents/config/routes.oas.json?ref=main" -o routes.oas.json && npx openapi --client fetch --input routes.oas.json --output src/generated
scripts.prepublishOnly: dotenv -e .env -- npm run generate:sdk && npm run build
